divs: Sighting DetailsThe dog was barking more than usual and I was having trouble sleeping. I saw a thin grey looking alien shape shadow walking down the road behind a skunk. Watch for about 30 to 35 secs then it just disappeared. Watched for another 30 minutes and nothing. I have never seen anything like this before and was a little startled by saying I even saw this, but I know it was about 3-4 feet tall and thin, just following a skunk.
Summary: I saw a grey looking shadowy figure with dark eyes walking down the street with a skunk. Never seen anythink like this before
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Yadkinville
There were no other sightings in Yadkinville on or around June 29th 2012
